tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE researchers (
    researcher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    research_field VARCHAR(255),
    genomics_data JSONB,
    drug_targets_found JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE genomics_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data TEXT,
  researcher_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researcher(id));

CREATE TABLE drug_targets (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_name VARCHAR,
  genomics_data_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (genomics_data_id) REFERENCES genomics_data(id));

CREATE TABLE biopharmaceuticals (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR,
  target_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES drug_targets(id));

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  result TEXT,
  date DATE,
  researcher_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researcher(id));
